Description: Calcite chalice with globular body and wide flaring neck with everted rim; high pedestal foot; repaired from fragments.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Hala Sultan Tekke, Tomb VIII
Bibliographic references: Bailey 1976 / Hala Sultan Tekke I. Excavations 1897-1971 (p. 15, pl.XV)
Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 23)
